sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const ManageOrdersPage = () => { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]); const [filteredOrders, setFilteredOrders] = useState([]); const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedOrder, setSelectedOrder] = useState(null); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); // Mock data for orders useEffect(() => { const mockOrders = [ { id: 'ORD-001', studentName: 'John Smith', email: 'john.smith@email.com', course: 'Advanced Mathematics', orderDate: '2024-06-01', amount: 299.99, status: 'completed', paymentMethod: 'Credit Card', phone: '+1-555-0123' }, { id: 'ORD-002', studentName: 'Sarah Johnson', email: 'sarah.j@email.com', course: 'Digital Marketing Fundamentals', orderDate: '2024-06-05', amount: 199.99, status: 'pending', paymentMethod: 'PayPal', phone: '+1-555-0124' }, { id: 'ORD-003', studentName: 'Michael Brown', email: 'mike.brown@email.com', course: 'Web Development Bootcamp', orderDate: '2024-06-08', amount: 499.99, status: 'processing', paymentMethod: 'Bank Transfer', phone: '+1-555-0125' }, { id: 'ORD-004', studentName: 'Emily Davis', email: 'emily.davis@email.com', course: 'Data Science Essentials', orderDate: '2024-06-10', amount: 349.99, status: 'cancelled', paymentMethod: 'Credit Card', phone: '+1-555-0126' }, { id: 'ORD-005', studentName: 'David Wilson', email: 'david.w@email.com', course: 'Graphic Design Masterclass', orderDate: '2024-06-09', amount: 279.99, status: 'completed', paymentMethod: 'PayPal', phone: '+1-555-0127' } ]; setOrders(mockOrders); setFilteredOrders(mockOrders); }, []); // Filter orders based on status and search term useEffect(() => { let filtered = orders; if (statusFilter !== 'all') { filtered = filtered.filter(order => order.status === statusFilter); } if (searchTerm) { filtered = filtered.filter(order => order.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || order.studentName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || order.course.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); } setFilteredOrders(filtered); }, [statusFilter, searchTerm, orders]); const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const statusClasses = { completed: 'bg-success', pending: 'bg-warning', processing: 'bg-info', cancelled: 'bg-danger' }; return statusClasses[status] || 'bg-secondary'; }; const updateOrderStatus = (orderId, newStatus) => { setOrders(orders.map(order => order.id === orderId ? { ...order, status: newStatus } : order )); setShowModal(false); }; const handleViewOrder = (order) => { setSelectedOrder(order); setShowModal(true); }; const getOrderStats = () => { const stats = { total: orders.length, completed: orders.filter(o => o.status === 'completed').length, pending: orders.filter(o => o.status === 'pending').length, processing: orders.filter(o => o.status === 'processing').length, cancelled: orders.filter(o => o.status === 'cancelled').length }; return stats; }; const stats = getOrderStats(); return (
{/* Header */}

Order Management

Manage and track all course orders

{/* Statistics Cards */}
Total Orders

{stats.total}

Completed

{stats.completed}

Pending

{stats.pending}

Processing

{stats.processing}

{/* Filters and Search */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Orders Table */}
Orders ({filteredOrders.length})
{filteredOrders.map(order => ( ))}
Order ID Student Course Date Amount Status Actions
{order.id}
{order.studentName}
{order.course}
{order.course} {new Date(order.orderDate).toLocaleDateString()} ${order.amount} {order.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + order.status.slice(1)}
{filteredOrders.length === 0 && (

No orders found matching your criteria

)}
{/* Order Details Modal */} {selectedOrder && (
Order Details - {selectedOrder.id}
Student Information
Name: {selectedOrder.studentName}
Email: {selectedOrder.email}
Phone: {selectedOrder.phone}
Order Information
Order ID: {selectedOrder.id}
Date: {new Date(selectedOrder.orderDate).toLocaleDateString()}
Status: {selectedOrder.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + selectedOrder.status.slice(1)}
Course Details
{selectedOrder.course}
Amount: ${selectedOrder.amount} Payment Method: {selectedOrder.paymentMethod}
)} {showModal &&
} {/* Bootstrap Icons CDN */} {/* Bootstrap CSS and JS */}
); }; export default ManageOrdersPage;
